mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_user SET uid = #{uid}, upw = #{upw}, nm = #{nm}, phone_number = #{phoneNumber}, email = #{email}
INSERT INTO t_address SET iuser = #{iuser}, nm = #{nm}, zip_code = #{zipCode}, address = #{address}, address_detail = #{addressDetail}, phone_number = #{phoneNumber}

SELECT A.nm, COUNT(if( B.process_state = 1, B.process_state, null )) AS 'beforeDeposit', COUNT(if( B.process_state = 2, B.process_state, null )) AS 'preparation', COUNT(if( B.process_state = 3, B.process_state, null )) AS 'shipping', COUNT(if( B.process_state = 4, B.process_state, null )) AS 'completed' FROM t_user A LEFT JOIN t_order B ON A.iuser = B.iuser WHERE A.iuser = #{iuser}
